title: Phone Call For A Day Off
context: You’re phone calling your boss to let him know you’re taking a day off. Respond appropriately to his questions for him to approve.
initialPrompt: Hello, this is Bob from Bob's Technology Inc. How can I help you?
factors: State the date they’re taking off
Name a convincing and valid reason
Say when the user will return to work
State that manager has been made aware
Confirm that there are no urgent tasks on the day of their absence
flow: When are you taking a day off?
And for what reason is this for?
So when will you return to work?
And has your manager been made aware?
Great, and are there any deadlines or meetings this day?
OK, I’ll approve your request to the HR team, have a nice day off
triggers: Ok, I’ll approve your request to the HR team, have a nice day off
